name: Wallbox
0:
”Alexa open My Wallbox Assistant”
”What can I do with Wallbox?”
”What commands are available to use with Wallbox?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my wallbox assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Wallbox skill lets you control and manage your connected Wallbox EV chargers. Start or stop a charging session, lock or unlock your charger, set a charging schedule, and more. Use your voice to manage up to four connected chargers. 


“Alexa, start charging my vehicle.”

“Alexa, what’s the status of my charger?”

“Alexa, schedule my charging.”

“Alexa, lock my charger.”

“Alexa, how much energy have I used to charge my battery this month?”


Setup Requirements:

This skill requires account-linking in order to be able to control your charger using Alexa. 

Before setting up this skill, be sure you have downloaded the myWallbox app to your mobile device, created a myWallbox account, and registered your charger. Download the myWallbox app at https://wallbox.com/
